userMessage: Execute memory_store_operational with args: {"incidentId":"cluster-scale-down-impact-2025","symptoms":["IngressControllerDegraded","TektonResultsStorageFailure","MachineSetScaleDown","ClusterOperatorDegraded"],"rootCause":"Infrastructure scale-down in eu-west-1a and eu-west-1b zones caused zone affinity conflicts for storage provisioning, preventing PostgreSQL database from scheduling. This cascaded to ingress router deployment issues and operator degradation.","resolution":"Identified that MachineSets in eu-west-1a and eu-west-1b zones were scaled to 0 machines, while only eu-west-1c had active worker nodes. This caused zone mismatch where PV required eu-west-1a but no nodes were available in that zone. The root cause was infrastructure scale-down rather than resource exhaustion or application-level scale-down.","affectedResources":["openshift-pipelines/tekton-results-postgres-0","openshift-ingress/router-default-5c65587884-mt5qx","openshift-machine-api/bootcamp-ocs-cluster-bx85m-worker-eu-west-1a","openshift-machine-api/bootcamp-ocs-cluster-bx85m-worker-eu-west-1b"],"environment":"prod","sessionId":"memory-store-12345"}
